title: MSEZ Corridor State Channel Transition Ruleset
description: Defines the canonical receipt payload, genesis_root, and next_root computation for verifiable corridor state channels.
genesis_root_definition: genesis_root = SHA256(JCS({tag:'msez.corridor.state.genesis.v1', corridor_id, definition_payload_sha256, agreement_set_sha256, lawpack_digest_set, ruleset_digest_set}))

zk_scaffold.notes: ZK proofs are optional and included as digests inside the receipt; verification and capability negotiation are corridor-specific.

anchoring_scaffold.notes: Roots may be periodically anchored to an external chain without changing the root model.
